title: Spectator
value: Never participate, watch as the chaos unfolds in-game!

title: Altruist
value: Revive dead crewmates in groups.

title: Aurial
value: Any player abilities used within your aura you will sense

title: Cleric
value: Cleanse negative effects off of crewmates and\%nl\%cast Barriers to stop any interactions altogether

title: Deputy
value: Camp crewmates, then shoot their killer in the meeting!

title: Forensic
value: Inspect crime scenes, then examine players to\%nl\%see if they were at the scene.

title: Engineer
value: Vent around and fix sabotages remotely

title: Haunter
value: Complete all your tasks without getting caught to reveal impostors!

title: Hunter
value: Stalk players to get alerted when they use an ability.\%nl\%Once they use an ability, you may kill them.

title: Imitator
value: Use dead players to benefit the crew via imitation in meetings

title: Investigator
value: You can see everyone's footprints.

title: Jailor
value: Jail crewmates to private talk to them, and\%nl\%execute them if they are an evildoer

title: Lookout
value: Watch other crewmates to see what roles interact with them

title: Mayor
value: Lead the crew to victory!

title: Medic
value: Protect a crewmate with a shield to defend them from attacks

title: Medium
value: Follow ghosts to get clues from them

title: Mirrorcaster
value: Protect a player with a Magic Mirror.\%nl\%If they are directly attacked, then\%nl\%unleash the attack onto another player!

title: Monarch
value: Knight crewmates to aid in meetings, but\%nl\%avoid knighting Evildoers.

title: Mystic
value: Understand when and where kills happen

title: Oracle
value: Bless crewmates to protect them in meetings, and\%nl\%make them confess in the meeting

title: Plumber
value: Flush the vent system to kick venters out, and\%nl\%barricade vents to block them the next round

title: Politician
value: Campaign crewmates in hopes to become the Mayor! At least half of\%nl\%the innocent players must be campaigned to reveal successfully

title: Prosecutor
value: Choose to exile anyone of your choosing

title: Seer
value: Reveal alliances of other players to find evildoers.

title: Sentry
value: Place cameras that appear in Security.

title: Sheriff
value: Kill off the impostors but don't kill crewmates

title: Snitch
value: Complete all your tasks to discover the Impostors.

title: Spy
value: Gain extra information on the Admin Table

title: Swapper
value: Swap votes from one player to another during a meeting

title: Sonar
value: Track suspicious players to see where they go

title: Transporter
value: Choose two players to swap locations with one another

title: Trapper
value: Place traps around the map, revealing roles within them

title: Veteran
value: Alert to attack whoever interacts with you.

title: Vigilante
value: Guess the roles of impostors mid-meeting to kill them!

title: Warden
value: Fortify crewmates to prevent interactions with them

title: Ambassador
value: Retrain yourself or fellow impostors into another role\%nl\%\%b\%Imp Killing cannot be a Power role\%/b\%\%nl\%\%b\%Imp Concealing/Support cannot be a Killing/Power role\%/b\%

title: Ambusher
value: Pursue a player, then ambush the closest player to them.\%nl\%If the player you ambush dies, then take their body with you.

title: Blackmailer
value: Silence a crewmate for the next meeting

title: Bomber
value: Place bombs to kill several crewmates upon detonation at once

title: Eclipsal
value: Blind players to prevent them from seeing others

title: Escapist
value: Mark a location, then recall to the location at\%nl\%any time to flee the scene of the crime

title: Grenadier
value: Flashbang the crewmates to get sneaky kills

title: Hypnotist
value: Hypnotize crewmates to prevent them from\%nl\%distinguishing players under a mass hysteria

title: Janitor
value: Clean bodies to hide kills and crime scenes

title: Miner
value: Place interconnected vents around the map

title: Morphling
value: Sample players and morph into them to disguise yourself.\%nl\%Your sample clears at the beginning of every round.

title: Parasite
value: Overtake a victim to control their movement.\%nl\%Press the same button again to kill them, or wait for the timer.

title: Scavenger
value: Kill your given targets for a reduced cooldown.\%nl\%If you fail to kill them, you will get penalized.

title: Puppeteer
value: Control crewmates to do your bidding!

title: Spellslinger
value: Hex all non-Impostors to set off a Hex Bomb

title: Swooper
value: Turn invisible and sneakily kill from the shadows

title: Traitor
value: Betray the crewmates with a new impostor role!

title: Undertaker
value: Drag bodies around to hide them from being reported

title: Venerer
value: Kill players to unlock ability perks. Your perks allow you\%nl\%to camouflage, sprint, and slow others down in your path.

title: Warlock
value: Charge your attack to 100% to kill crewmates in small bursts

title: Amnesiac
value: Find a dead body to remember and become their role.

title: Arsonist
value: Douse players and ignite to kill all nearby doused targets.

title: Doomsayer
value: Win by guessing the roles of \%guessCount\% players.

title: Glitch
value: Hack players to stop their abilities momentarily,\%nl\%mimic into others to frame them.

title: Inquisitor
value: Vanquish your Heretics or get them killed.\%nl\%You will win after every heretic dies.\%nl\%If they're all dead after a meeting ends,\%nl\%you'll leave \%and\% announce your victory

title: Chef
value: Feed the crewmates with cooked corpses.\%nl\%Once your quota is fed, leave in victory!

title: Jester
value: Be as suspicious as possible, and get voted out!

title: Juggernaut
value: With each kill your kill cooldown decreases.

title: Mercenary
value: Guard players to get gold upon interaction,\%nl\%then bribe the winners!

title: Pestilence
value: Kill everyone in your path that interacts with you!

title: Spectre
value: Complete all your tasks without being caught!

title: Plaguebearer
value: Infect everyone to become \%color=#4D4D4DFF\%Pestilence\%/color\%

title: Survivor
value: Stay alive to win with any faction remaining

title: Vampire
value: Bite other players to convert them or kill them

title: Werewolf
value: Rampage to kill quickly, increase your\%nl\%vision, and vent away temporarily

title: Fairy
value: Protect \%target\% with your life!

title: Time Lord
value: Use Rewind to pull everyone back a few seconds.

title: Executioner
value: Get \%target\% voted out to win.

title: Soul Collector
value: Reap the souls of others, leaving behind a lasting image
